TopicTitle: 1.2.2 last version not working on OS X Sierra

Articles.Content:
Hello

I just downloaded the last 1.2.2 version for mac OS X. Build id is 01622. It does not work, staying blocked at "loading bundle asset definition". My mac is updated at the last version of OS X Sierra. What's happening?

The build id 01604 is working.

The latest version of the game is 1.3. You've got pretty much no chance of this being fixed if it's a problem on KSP's end, as 1.2.2 is no longer supported. 

Hope this helps!
Ok, so why is it still in download section in the store?

14 hours ago, gilflo said:

Ok, so why is it still in download section in the store?

Because some people want to stay on the previous release until all their wanted mods are updated.

But it doesn't means that Squad will continue to fix bugs in earlier releases until all 3:rd party software has been updated (if that ever happens).

I was just wondering why they let to download a non working version (01622) as the version 01604 works perfectly !

At least they could leave the 1604 for download!

Edited July 18, 2017 by gilflo

^ this is what you have to do. They fixed the way they packaged it in 1.3 so you no longer have to but until you upgrade to 1.3 (and download the .pkg and not the zip) you'll have to do what all of us mac users have had to do for a while.
